        Creates a new instance of RushHourCar with the given start and end coordinates. Also adds blocks. Note this will fail if a car is not linear

    • Method Detail

      • getValidMoves

        public java.util.ArrayList<RushHourCar> getValidMoves(java.util.ArrayList<RushHourCar> cars,
                                             int width,
                                             int height)
        Get's valid moves for this car, given a board First it checks if the car is horizontal or vertical, then depending on which it is, it makes new car one block in each possible direction. It then checks both of these new cars to see if they are valid moves on the given board and if so adds them to the return list
        Parameters:
        cars - The current cars on the board, for checking if the new move is valid
        width - The width of the board
        height - The height of the board
        Returns:
        List of RushHourCar that is the valid moves for this car

      • isValid

        public static boolean isValid(RushHourCar car,
              java.util.ArrayList<RushHourCar> cars,
              int width,
              int height)
        Checks if a given car is valid on the given board
        Parameters:
        car - The car to check if valid
        cars - An ArrayList of cars that the new car is to be checked agaisnt
        width - Width of board
        height - Height of board
        Returns:
        if the new car is valid or not
